content.prompt: The United States went to war in 1812 for all of the following reasons EXCEPT to

choices.label: end British claims for repayment of Loyalist debt
prevent France from recapturing the Louisiana Territory
stop the British from searching and seizing American ships
appease members of Congress who advocated war
deal with conflicts between settlers and American Indians in the Northwest Territory

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
